message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $12000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $11000 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11000 is still more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm sticking with my offer of $9000. It's a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're sticking to your guns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $10000, but that's as low as I can go.
